key.name: context-menu-icons
key.description: If enabled, icons can be displayed in context menu. If disabled, context menu will not have any icons.

key.name: iconview-expend-item
key.description: If enabled, the select item can be expended to show full name when that don't fit in icon viewmode. If disabled,the select item will not be expended when file name that don't fit and ellipsis should appear.
